sentence: White roses are a symbol of purity.

They are having an intense quarrel over a critical issue.
.

sentence: The red slice makes up about a quarter of the whole.
sentence_tra: 这红色的部分占整体的1/4。

mean_cn: v. 被再注满，再装满n. 续杯，再注满
sentence: I need to refill my car - I'm almost out of fuel.
sentence_tra: 我需要给车加油――快没燃料了。

sentence: Our business success is based on four fundamental principles.
sentence_tra: 我们生意的成功是基于四项基本的原则。

mean_cn: v.发臭，臭名昭著n.发臭，愤然反对
sentence: It's embarrassing how much my shoes stink.
sentence_tra: 我的鞋臭死了，真尴尬啊。

mean_cn: adj.瞎的，盲目的v.使失明，蒙蔽n.盲点，百叶窗
sentence: I'm blind, but my dog can see for me.
sentence_tra: 虽然我失明了，但是我的狗可以给我导航。

sentence: Sort your garbage into different bins.
sentence_tra: 请把你的垃圾分类放入不同的垃圾桶。

sentence: Many people came to support the president's campaign.
sentence_tra: 很多人都来这儿支持总统的竞选活动。

mean_cn: n.[纸] 硬纸板；卡纸板；纸板箱adj.不真实的；硬纸板制的
sentence: We will send it to you in a cardboard box.
sentence_tra: 我们会把它装在纸盒里给你送去。

sentence: Most of our trash ends up in a landfill like this.
sentence_tra: 我们的大多数垃圾最终都成了这样的垃圾堆。

sentence: Substances like water can exist in solid, liquid or gaseous form.
sentence_tra: 像水这种物质可以以固态、液态或者气态的形式存在。

sentence: She applies her face cream every morning.
sentence_tra: 她每天早上都抹面霜。

mean_cn: adj. 不道德的; 邪恶的; 淫荡的;
sentence: Stealing, lying, and hurting others are all immoral.
sentence_tra: 偷盗、欺骗或者伤害他人都是不道德的。

mean_cn: n.礼物，赠送物v.赠送，呈现adj.出席的
sentence: A present for me? Thank you! You're so sweet.
sentence_tra: 给我的礼物？谢谢，你真好！

sentence: If you commit fraud, you will end up in jail.
sentence_tra: 如果你犯了诈骗罪，你最后的结局就是坐牢。

sentence: The baby doesn't like it when his mother force-feeds him.
sentence_tra: 宝宝不喜欢妈妈强迫喂食。

sentence: He is pro-environment and tries to make the world a better place.
sentence_tra: 他是环保支持者，他试图把世界变得更美好。

mean_cn: n. 隧道；管子，管道；地铁
sentence: We use these stainless steel tubes to pump dangerous chemicals through.
sentence_tra: 我们用这些不锈钢管来引流一些危险的化学制品。

sentence: These cartons have faces and hands.
sentence_tra: 这些纸盒有脸和手。

mean_cn: v.拿住；掌握；拥有n.掌握；拥有；货仓
sentence: To hold someone's hand is a sign of love.
sentence_tra: 握住一个人的手是爱的表现。

mean_cn: n.二择一，替代物，交替adj. 两者择一的，另类的
sentence: There are five alternative answers for each question.
sentence_tra: 这个问题有五个备选答案。

sentence: He gets a lot of publicity; he's always on TV.
sentence_tra: 他总是上电视，所以博得了很多公众的注意。

sentence: This project has been a long process.
sentence_tra: 这个项目经历了一个很长的流程。

mean_cn: n. 动机; 诱因;  adj. 有说服力的;  劝诱的;
sentence: The girl was very persuasive in trying to get me to buy her a drink.
sentence_tra: 女孩很有说服力，劝说我给她买了一瓶饮料。

sentence: I decided to take up the guitar as a hobby, even though I'm a little old for it.
sentence_tra: 我决定把吉他当爱好,虽然我现在学有点老。

mean_cn: n. 漏洞; 泄漏; v. 漏; 泄露;
sentence: The pipe has sprung a big leak.
sentence_tra: 管道裂开造成了严重的泄漏。

mean_cn: adj.独特的，独一无二的adj.(唯一的) 特有的
sentence: Fingerprints are unique to each individual.
sentence_tra: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

sentence: The sunrise is so amazing!
sentence_tra: 日出美得惊人！

sentence: Open the packaging to see if the products arrived safely.
sentence_tra: 打开那些包裹来看看那些货物是否安全到达。

sentence: We will publicize our business using advertisements.
sentence_tra: 我们将用广告来宣传我们的生意。

mean_cn: n.帮主，主人，大师；硕士adj.精通的，主要的v.掌握，精通
sentence: It takes decades of training to become a kung fu master.
sentence_tra: 需要花费几十年的训练才能成为功夫高手。

mean_cn: v.(指恐惧等)缠住；使烦扰；对…着迷
sentence: The woman is obsessed with money!
sentence_tra: 那个女士财迷心窍。

sentence: She hired a personal trainer for better results.
sentence_tra: 为了更好的训练效果，她雇了一个私人教练。

mean_cn: n. 重要器官;  要害;  adj. 生命所必需的;  有生命力的;  必不可少的;  生命攸关的;  致命的;
sentence: Exercising is vital for health.
sentence_tra: 锻炼对健康来说是必需的。

sentence: They like to blow bubbles.
sentence_tra: 他们喜欢吹泡泡。

sentence: I am responsible for the safety of all these planes.
sentence_tra: 我对这些飞机的安全负责。

sentence: Pollution has damaged the world's ozone layer and let in harmful ultra-violet light.
sentence_tra: 污染损害了地球的大气层，使得有害的紫外线能进入。

mean_cn: adj. 分隔的，拆开的，撇开的adv. 分隔，分别；相距
sentence: They set one man apart from the rest.
sentence_tra: 他们把一个人从人群里分离出来了。

sentence: I foresee many good things will happen in your future.
sentence_tra: 我预见很多好事情会发生在你的未来。

sentence: Our company is a large manufacturer of household goods.
sentence_tra: 我们公司是大型日用商品制造商。

sentence: He waited impatiently for her to get ready.
sentence_tra: 他很不耐烦地等她准备好。

sentence: The dam keeps the river from flooding the town.
sentence_tra: 大坝让小镇免于河流泛滥的洪水。

sentence: The little boy provided some bread for the ducks.
sentence_tra: 小男孩给鸭子们喂了一些面包。

sentence: Orchids are my favorite flowers.
sentence_tra: 兰花是我最喜欢的花。

sentence: The universe is vast.
sentence_tra: 宇宙是巨大的。

mean_cn: n.烟雾；［化］气溶，烟雾剂adj.喷雾的；喷雾器的
sentence: Spraying scent from this aerosol can makes the room smell better.
sentence_tra: 喷点这种喷雾香气能让屋子好闻点儿。

mean_cn: n. 结果, 后果;  结论, 推论;
sentence: The alcohol addiction harms your heath and results in some bad consequences.
sentence_tra: 酗酒有损健康还会导致一些不好的后果。

mean_cn: n. 发展；进程，课程，一道菜
sentence: My biology course was cancelled from Monday's school schedule.
sentence_tra: 我周一的生物课取消了。

mean_cn: n. 闪光;  刹那;  vi. 闪光;  发火花;  adj. 炫耀的;  浮夸的;  一闪而过的;  vt. 闪, 闪烁;
sentence: The lightning struck with a flash of light.
sentence_tra: 闪电击出闪光。

sentence: Profits have increased year on year.
sentence_tra: 利润连年增长。

mean_cn: n. 方式;  举止;  风俗, 习惯;   规矩, 风度;
sentence: The doctor spoke in a manner that made children calm.
sentence_tra: 这个医生用一种能使孩子安心的方式说话。

mean_cn: n.原因，理由；事业；目标 v.引起，造成
sentence: Drinking at work will cause you to be fired.
sentence_tra: 工作时喝酒会导致你被开除。

mean_cn: adj.流行性的，传染的 n.流行病，盛行
sentence: There was a flu epidemic this winter.
sentence_tra: 这个冬天发生了流感疫情。

sentence: The flight was delayed, so I'll have to wait until tomorrow.
sentence_tra: 这班飞机延迟了，我不得不等到明天。

sentence: Your computer doesn't work? Did you switch it on?
sentence_tra: 你的电脑不能运行？你开电源了吗？

mean_cn: vt. 迷住, 使着迷, 使烦扰;
sentence: Why does she obsess about her shoes like that?
sentence_tra: 她为什么那样痴迷于她的鞋？

sentence: She was obese but after following a hard workout she gained a good shape.
sentence_tra: 她之前她很胖，但在刻苦锻炼后，她获得了一个好身材。

mean_cn: n. 有权势的人;  adj. 强大的, 强有力的, 有势力的;  adv. 很, 非常;
sentence: The mighty ant can lift a thousand times its own weight.
sentence_tra: 强大有力的蚂蚁能举起比自身重近千倍的东西。

mean_cn: n.(混合物的)组成部分，(烹调的)原料，(构成)要素，因素
sentence: This kind of chocolate is made from many ingredients.
sentence_tra: 这种巧克力是由很多种原料制成的。

sentence: A good cooking pan is important for all chefs.
sentence_tra: 好的平底锅对所有大厨都很重要。

mean_cn: n. 指挥, 命令;  vi. 发布命令, 指挥;  掌管, 控制;  vt. 指挥, 命令;  控制, 管理;
sentence: My dog is smart enough to obey my commands.
sentence_tra: 我家汪星人足够聪明，可以听从我的命令。

sentence: Wow, look at how many layers that sandwich has!
sentence_tra: 哇，看看那个三明治有多少层！

mean_cn: adv.直接地，径直地；马上，立即
sentence: Why go through all that trouble when you can walk through directly?
sentence_tra: 明明能直接穿过，为什么还要费那么多麻烦？

sentence: Because of the recession, we've had to cut down on our expenses.
sentence_tra: 因为不景气，我们已经不得不削减我们的开支。

sentence: Nuclear war is a serious threat.
sentence_tra: 核战是一种很严重的威胁。

mean_cn: n.臭氧；(口)新鲜空气；能使人兴奋的力量
sentence: The ozone layer protects us from harmful ultra-violet radiation.
sentence_tra: 臭氧层能保护我们免受紫外线辐射的伤害。

mean_cn: v.（动物）咆哮，吼叫n. 咆哮声，怨言，打嗝声
sentence: The angry lion lets out a fierce growl.
sentence_tra: 发怒的狮子发出愤怒的咆哮。

sentence: The total depletion of my piggy bank was an unpleasant surprise.
sentence_tra: 储蓄罐里面的钱全都用完了，这真是个让人不快的意外！

sentence: On your tenth birthday, you have had one decade in this world.
sentence_tra: 在你十岁生日时，你在这个世界上有了一个十年。

sentence: Belgium's a European country. It's tiny, but they make great waffles.
sentence_tra: 比利时是个欧洲国家，它很小，但是那儿的华夫饼超棒！

mean_cn: adj. 魔术的; 不可思议的; 有魔力的;
sentence: She has magical powers, just like Harry Potter.
sentence_tra: 她就像哈利・波特一样有魔力。

mean_cn: n.工作；作品vi.起作用，有效果，奏效
sentence: I love my job, so I work very hard.
sentence_tra: 我爱我的工作，所以我工作很努力。

sentence: The missionary tried to convert the local people to his religion.
sentence_tra: 传教士向当地的人传教。

sentence: Native Americans used to live on bison meat.
sentence_tra: 美洲土著人曾以野牛肉为食。

sentence: People with mental health problems can go to a psychologist for help.
sentence_tra: 有精神健康问题的人们可以去心理医生那里寻求帮助。

mean_cn: v.偷看，窥视 n.偷看，窥见
sentence: I quickly peeked into the bedroom.
sentence_tra: 我快速地朝卧室偷看了一眼。

sentence: The origin of mankind is still mysterious, but we think our ancestors lived in the trees.
sentence_tra: 人类起源虽然仍是谜，但是我们认为我们的祖先生活在树上。

mean_cn: n. 名望, 名声;  vt. 盛传, 使有名;
sentence: Media is attracted by her fame.
sentence_tra: 媒体被她的名声所吸引。

sentence: The detective investigates the ground, hoping to learn something about the case.
sentence_tra: 侦探勘察了地面，希望可以找到一些案件的线索。

sentence: I wash my car daily to maintain its shine.
sentence_tra: 我每天都洗车来维持它的光洁如新。

mean_cn: adj.现实(主义)的；逼真的，栩栩如生的
sentence: Wow - that's a pretty realistic drawing of a violinist!
sentence_tra: 哇！那真是一幅栩栩如生的小提琴手素描！

sentence: Yeah, your car's visible--I can see it over there.
sentence_tra: 是的，你的车很显眼，我可以看到它在那儿。

sentence: Do you believe in God?
sentence_tra: 你相信上帝吗？

mean_cn: adj. 宗教的;  虔诚的;  修道的;  严谨的;
sentence: Religious people believe prayer helps them and others.
sentence_tra: 宗教人士相信祈祷可以帮助他们和其他人。

sentence: She claims her baggage at the airport.
sentence_tra: 她在机场领取行李。

mean_cn: n. 公猪;  公猪肉;  野公猪;
sentence: Boars are fierce, wild, hairy male pigs.
sentence_tra: 野公猪是凶残、野性、多毛的公猪。

sentence: Archaeologists look for old things in the ground.
sentence_tra: 考古学家在地里找旧东西。

sentence: She was really upset after her presentation to the class didn't go well.
sentence_tra: 在班上做完不理想的报告以后，她很沮丧。

sentence: The car dealer gave us a great deal on our new car.
sentence_tra: 汽车经销商在我们买这辆新车时给了我们很大的优惠。

sentence: The answer was undoubtedly two.
sentence_tra: 无容置疑答案就是二。

mean_cn: v.  基于； 以 ... 为依据
sentence: They produce a movie based on the book.
sentence_tra: 他们基于这本书创作了一部电影。

sentence: People had to cook over an open fire in the Stone Age.
sentence_tra: 在石器时代，人们不得不用火堆来烹饪。

sentence: The atomic explosion was tremendously loud, bright, and destructive.
sentence_tra: 原子弹爆炸非常响、非常亮，极具有破坏性。

sentence: She was told not to look at her birthday present but she couldn't resist taking a peek at it.
sentence_tra: 她被要求不准看生日礼物，但她忍不住偷看了一眼。

sentence: The Netherlands are famous for their windmills and tulips.
sentence_tra: 荷兰以风车和郁金香出名。

sentence: She took her own life by taking too many sleeping pills.
sentence_tra: 她吃了过量安眠药，自杀死了。

mean_cn: adj. 财政的; 金融的;
sentence: It's easy to make money in the financial industry.
sentence_tra: 在金融业赚钱很容易。

mean_cn: n. 社区，团体，(生)群落；人群，很多个体的集合体
sentence: Our village is a happy community where we all like to help our neighbors.
sentence_tra: 因为我们邻里间都喜欢相互帮助，所以我们的社区很和谐。

sentence: My friend is a well-known painter. His paintings can sell for hundreds of dollars!
sentence_tra: 我的朋友是个知名画家。他的作品可以卖到几百美元。

sentence: 'Cupid and Psyche' is a masterpiece of classical sculpture.
sentence_tra: "丘比特与普绪刻"是古典雕刻技艺中的杰出作品。

sentence: This antique car dates from the 50's.
sentence_tra: 这辆古董车的历史能追溯到50年代。

mean_cn: n.一击，(病)突然发作；中风；棍棒（笔或刷子的）；笔画 v.划掉；抚摸；击打
sentence: The stroke of his club sent the ball flying high in the air.
sentence_tra: 他球杆这一击把球送上了高高的天空。

mean_cn: v. 嘲笑，愚弄n. 嘲笑，愚弄
sentence: I'm sick of being ridiculed by my dumb coworker.
sentence_tra: 我受够了愚蠢的同事们的嘲笑。

mean_cn: n. 视野；见解； 风景v. 看，俯瞰；视察
sentence: What an amazing view from up here!
sentence_tra: 山顶的风景太赞了！

sentence: At only four years old, she's already an amateur photographer.
sentence_tra: 虽然只有四岁，她已经俨然是个小小业余摄影师了。

mean_cn: v. 钦佩；赞美；羡慕；喜欢
sentence: I admire the beautiful decorations on this cake.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢这个蛋糕上漂亮的装饰。

mean_cn: n.摘要 adj.抽象的，深奥的
sentence: Abstract art doesn't look like anything.
sentence_tra: 抽象艺术看起来不像任何具体的东西。

sentence: I think 'impossible' looks better if we cut off the 'im-'.
sentence_tra: 我觉得把“impossible”这个单词的“im-”去掉更好。

mean_cn: adj.真正的，名副其实的；真诚的
sentence: The stamp certifies that the product is genuine and not a fake.
sentence_tra: 这邮戳证明了这个产品是真的，不是假货。

sentence: This old artefact was made by a craftsman thousands of years ago.
sentence_tra: 这个古老的人工制品是数千年前的手工艺人制作的。

sentence: The clarity of the water and the reflection is amazing.
sentence_tra: 清澈的湖水，倒映的风景美极了！

sentence: The winner deserves the prize--he was really the best.
sentence_tra: 冠军应得这个奖，他真的很棒！

sentence: She possesses many pairs of shoes.
sentence_tra: 她有很多双鞋。

mean_cn: n.科目；主题；受试者v.使隶属，使受到
sentence: English was my favorite subject in school.
sentence_tra: 英语是我在学校最喜欢的学科。

mean_cn: adj. 生物的, 栩栩如生的;  逼真的, 惟妙惟肖的;
sentence: That picture's quite lifelike - it almost looks real.
sentence_tra: 这张图片很逼真――看起来几乎是真的。

mean_cn: n.上司，长辈adj.优良的，卓越的，较高级的
sentence: Our superiors tell us what to do.
sentence_tra: 我们的上司告诉我们要做什么。
